channel.title: Quick question - Digging emote
channel.description:
Hey guys on my UseItem.java file the digging emote is set to 409, which although it works perfectly is not the correct emote...
i know that the correct emote is 831 and i tried changing the code slightly just to change the emote... but it loops for ages and i can't work out why it does this or how to stop it.
the code currently in UseItem.java [code]case 952:
c.sM("You dig.."); c.setAnimation(409);
break;[/code] i tried change the c.setAnimation(409); to c.setAnimation(831); But it loops forever.. can anyone suggest a fix?

item.title: Quick question - Digging emote
item.dc:creator: @Jammydee Jammydee
item.description:
@Jammydee wrote:

Hey guys on my UseItem.java file the digging emote is set to 409, which although it works perfectly is not the correct emote…

i know that the correct emote is 831 and i tried changing the code slightly just to change the emote… but it loops for ages and i can’t work out why it does this or how to stop it.

the code currently in UseItem.java

[code]case 952:

			c.sM("You dig..");
			c.setAnimation(409);
				
			break;[/code]

i tried change the c.setAnimation(409); to c.setAnimation(831); But it loops forever…
can anyone suggest a fix?

Read full topic
